Reference

All functions

approx_vec()

Linear interpolation of NAs.

clean_data()

Check, convert and shape the input data.

DSHW()

Automatic training of DSHW

elec_load

Hourly electricity load

elec_price

Hourly day-ahead electricity spot prices

ELM()

Automatic training of ELMs

errors()

Calculate forecast errors

error_metrics()

Estimate accuracy metrics to evaluate point forecast

fitted(<DSHW>)

Extract fitted values from a DSHW

fitted(<ELM>)

Extract fitted values from a ELM

fitted(<MLP>)

Extract fitted values from a MLP.

fitted(<SMEAN>)

Extract fitted values from SMEAN

fitted(<SMEDIAN>)

Extract fitted values from SMEDIAN

fitted(<TBATS>)

Extract fitted values from a TBATS

forecast(<DSHW>)

Forecast a trained DSHW model

forecast(<ELM>)

Forecast a trained ELM model

forecast(<MLP>)

Forecast a trained MLP model

forecast(<SMEAN>)

Forecast a trained SMEAN model

forecast(<SMEDIAN>)

Forecast a trained SMEDIAN model

forecast(<TBATS>)

Forecast a trained TBATS model

iqr_vec()

Replace outliers based on IQR method by NAs.

kurtosis_vec()

Measure of kurtosis.

mae_vec()

Calculate the mean absolute error

mape_vec()

Calculate the mean absolute percentage error

me_vec()

Calculate the mean error

MLP()

Automatic training of MLPs

model_sum(<DSHW>)

Provide a succinct summary of the DSHW

model_sum(<ELM>)

Provide a succinct summary of the ELM

model_sum(<MLP>)

Provide a succinct summary of the MLP

model_sum(<SMEAN>)

Provide a succinct summary of the SMEAN

model_sum(<SMEDIAN>)

Provide a succinct summary of the SMEDIAN

model_sum(<TBATS>)

Provide a succinct summary of the TBATS

mpe_vec()

Calculate the mean percentage error

mse_vec()

Calculate the mean squared error

pct_errors()

Calculate percentage forecast errors

plot_acf()

Plot autocorrelation function

plot_corr()

Plot autocorrelation and partial autocorrelation function

plot_density()

Plot the density via Kernel Density Estimator

plot_error_metrics()

Plot forecast accuracy metrics

plot_forecast()

Plot the actual and fitted values and forecasts

plot_histogram()

Plot the histogram of time series

plot_line()

Plot time series as line chart

plot_pacf()

Plot partial autocorrelation function

plot_qq()

Quantile-Quantile plot

residuals(<DSHW>)

Extract residuals from a DSHW

residuals(<ELM>)

Extract residuals from a ELM

residuals(<MLP>)

Extract residuals from a MLP

residuals(<SMEAN>)

Extract residuals from SMEAN

residuals(<SMEDIAN>)

Extract residuals from SMEDIAN

residuals(<TBATS>)

Extract residuals from a TBATS

rmse_vec()

Calculate the root mean squared error

scale_color_tscv()

Color scale constructor for tscv colors.

scale_fill_tscv()

Fill scale constructor for tscv colors.

skewness_vec()

Measure of skewness.

smape_vec()

Calculate the symmetric mean absolute percentage error

SMEAN()

Automatic training of SMEANs

SMEDIAN()

Automatic training of SMEDIANs

smooth_outlier()

Identify and smooth outliers.

split_data()

Split the data into training and testing

summarise_data()

Summary statistics for time series data

summarise_split()

Summary table of the splitting into training and testing. @description This functions provides a summary table of the splitting into the training and testing data. This means, the function is applied to the result of a call to split_data(...).

  • slice: Time slice

  • dates_train: Date (or date-time) range of the training data

  • dates_test: Date (or date-time) range of the testing data

  • index_train: Index range of the training data

  • index_test: Index range of the testing data

target_vars()

Return target variables.

TBATS()

Automatic training of a TBATS model

theme_tscv()

Custom ggplot2 theme for tscv package

theme_tscv_dark()

Dark ggplot2 theme for tscv package

train_dshw()

Train DSHW model

train_elm()

Train ELM neural network

train_mlp()

Train MLP neural network

train_smean()

Train seasonal mean model

train_smedian()

Train seasonal median model

train_tbats()

Train TBATS model

tscv_cols()

Function to extract tscv colors as hex codes.

tscv_pal()

Return function to interpolate a tscv color palette.

value_var()

Return value variable.

weather

Hourly weather data
